src:
Fortnite tem novo pacote de conteúdos (Vídeo)
Fortnite: Darkfire Bundle para PlayStation 4, Xbox One e Nintendo Switch.

06 Nov 2019, 09:32

A Warner Bros. Interactive Entertainment e a Epic Games anunciaram o lançamento de Fortnite: Darkfire Bundle em formato físico para a PlayStation 4, Xbox One e Nintendo Switch.
O novo pacote de conteúdos para o popular título de Battle Royale contém o emote Unification, as skins Dark Power Chord, Shadow Ark, Molten Omen, os wraps Dark Angular Shift, Molten Angular Shift, Shadow Angular Shift, e as picaretas Dark Strikers Dual-Wielding, Molten Strikers Dual-Wielding e Shadow Strikers Dual-Wielding.
O Fortnite: Darkfire Bundle está disponível na Europa com um PVP recomendado de 29,99 euros.
text:
Fortnite has new content pack (Video)
Fortnite: Darkfire Bundle for PlayStation 4, Xbox One and Nintendo Switch.

06 Nov 2019, 09:32

Warner Bros. Interactive Entertainment and Epic Games announced the release of Fortnite: Darkfire Bundle in physical format for PlayStation 4, Xbox One and Nintendo Switch.
The new content pack for the popular Battle Royale title contains the Unification emote, Dark Power Chord, Shadow Ark, Molten Omen skins, Dark Angular Shift wraps, Molten Angular Shift, Shadow Angular Shift, and Dark Strikers Dual-picks. Wielding, Molten Strikers Dual-Wielding and Shadow Strikers Dual-Wielding.
Fortnite: Darkfire Bundle is available in Europe with a recommended PVP of 29.99 euros.
